titleStmt.title: Act anent the leavies of horse and foot, to be put out by the shires and burghs. And the list of the colonells, with their several numbers of horse and foot.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, print show-through with loss of text.
